userStories.title: Create .vscode/mcp.json template
userStories.description:
## Task
Create a VS Code MCP configuration template file.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Create `.vscode/mcp.json` with Brain Dumpy server config
- [ ] Use stdio transport
- [ ] Include comments explaining each field
- [ ] Add to .gitignore or provide as .example

## File to Create
`.vscode/mcp.json`

userStories.title: Create start_ticket_work MCP tool
userStories.description:
## Task
Add MCP tool to start work on a ticket.

## Behavior
- Takes ticketId as parameter
- Creates git branch: `feature/{ticket-short-id}-{slug}`
- Sets ticket status to `in_progress`
- Returns branch name and ticket context

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Tool registered in MCP server
- [ ] Branch created with correct naming
- [ ] Ticket status updated
- [ ] Works in both Claude and VS Code

## File to Modify
`src/mcp/tools/` (or wherever MCP tools live)

userStories.title: Create complete_ticket_work MCP tool
userStories.description:
## Task
Add MCP tool to complete work on a ticket.

## Behavior
- Takes ticketId as parameter
- Sets ticket status to `review`
- Optionally generates PR description from commits
- Returns summary of work done

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Tool registered in MCP server
- [ ] Ticket status updated to review
- [ ] Works in both Claude and VS Code

## File to Modify
`src/mcp/tools/`

userStories.title: Create link_commit_to_ticket MCP tool
userStories.description:
## Task
Add MCP tool to link a git commit to a ticket.

## Behavior
- Takes ticketId and commitHash as parameters
- Stores commit reference in ticket metadata
- Returns confirmation

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Tool registered in MCP server
- [ ] Commit hash stored with ticket
- [ ] Can query commits for a ticket later

## File to Modify
`src/mcp/tools/`

userStories.title: Create link_files_to_ticket MCP tool
userStories.description:
## Task
Add MCP tool to associate files with a ticket.

## Behavior
- Takes ticketId and file paths array
- Stores file associations in ticket
- Returns confirmation

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Tool registered in MCP server
- [ ] Files stored in ticket.linked_files
- [ ] Handles relative and absolute paths

## File to Modify
`src/mcp/tools/`

userStories.title: Create get_tickets_for_file MCP tool
userStories.description:
## Task
Add MCP tool to find tickets related to a file.

## Behavior
- Takes file path as parameter
- Returns tickets that have this file linked
- Useful for context when working on a file

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Tool registered in MCP server
- [ ] Returns relevant tickets
- [ ] Handles partial path matching

## File to Modify
`src/mcp/tools/`
